name: Moose In Canada
description:
This is a game Ive wanted to make for a long time. Ive spent a while on this and Im proud to upload this game.  The game only has 2 colors and I really like that style which is inspired by West Of Loathing. The goal is to escape Canada! Share any bugs if you can please. This game is a joke by the way and any jokes are not meant to offend anyone so dont cancel me please. Thanks! Donate if you want

Credits

Coding - Me

Art - Me

Music + SFX - Me, my friend, Pixabay and Sfxr

Speedrun.com - https://www.speedrun.com/moose_in_canada/full_game?h=100_All_Hats&x=824e6xgk

If you for some reason were to stream this the twitch game thing is up I think
